message.content:
cs.IT, cs.GT, cs.MA, cs.SY, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the problem of channel sensing in communication systems, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT). The problem is formulated as a restless bandit problem, which is a topic in game theory (cs.GT). The use of Markov chains to model the channels suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-category of mathematical analysis (cs.MA). The objective of maximizing the expected total reward collected over a finite or infinite horizon suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-category of control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the use of policies to solve the problem suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
